Distribution in Iran .
Fars , Hormozgan , Kordestan , Lorestan , Sistan & Baluchestan ( Gerstmeier & Kuff 1992 ).
General distribution. Imported into Wales, UAE, Iran, Oriental Region ( Gerstmeier 2010 ).
